title: Hour 1: Fins Up
description:
In this episode, Stephen A., Michael Irvin, and Dan Orlovsky react to Jimmy Garoppolo's accidental safety last night and reminisce on a similar incident in 2008. After the Dolphins handed the Bills their first loss of the season, the crew debates if the two teams should be put on the same level. The Packers-Buccaneers game last night saw Rodgers come out on top, but are the guys giving Brady a pass due to the injuries plaguing his team? Stephen A., Irvin, and Orlovsky discuss early concerns for the Chiefs after their week 3 loss. Plus, Lamar Jackson ruined the Patriots home opener with a four-touchdown performance, but is it too early to call him an MVP favorite?

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Are the Miami Dolphins on the same level as the Buffalo Bills?

Stephen A., Irvin, and Orlovsky discuss early concerns for the Chiefs after their week 3 loss.
